paragraphs.body: I noticed that this image category covers only the Era of Raava Spirit Wilds. The main article covers the ones from the poles, the swamp, and the ones in Republic City as well. Is it ok to add images from those Spirit Wilds to this category? ${link_0} - ${link_1} - ${link_2} 16:58, May 31, 2015 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: I noticed that this image category covers only the Era of Raava Spirit Wilds. The main article covers the ones from the poles, the swamp, and the ones in Republic City as well. Is it ok to add images from those Spirit Wilds to this category? Omnibender - Talk - Contributions 16:58, May 31, 2015 (UTC)
